text: Johns Quijote is a band from Oslo, Norway, led by singer, guitarist and songwriter John Ivar Bye, released on the Sandvika-based Farmen music label. Johns Quijote's music style is a smooth jazz, rock, cabaret and Tom Waits- esque music style, often described as 'adult, cultivated, and melancholy'. Reviews of the JQ albums have been mixed, but he is a popular performer on the Oslo music scene. ==External links== *Johns Quijotes web site ==References== Category:Norwegian musical groups
title: Johns Quijote
